PITA Asset Placement Packages
===========================================

The `pitapy.base.asset_placement` package encompasses a suite of modules and classes designed for the flexible and dynamic placement of assets within simulation environments in the PITA Algorithm framework. It includes strategies for fixed, random, and rule-based object placements, along with the management of object distributions and validation of placement constraints.
